Articles.Content:
Hey guys so I was tired of playing vanilla KSP so I decided to download Realism Overhaul and some other mods. When I open the game everything is fine and I get no errors but when I go in settings or I create a new game, the game gets stuck on the black loading screen. My game version is 1.2.2 and my pc specs are : Gtx 1070 / Intel core I5 6600k / 16 gb of ram. 

Ps: all my mods are on the latest version of 1.2.2

Edit: I'm using the 64bit version of KSP


 

 

Edited October 17, 2017 by KikooTrolling007

May sound silly but try running as administrator.

I had this on 1.2.2 and still had it on my current 1.3, especially if running from the launcher.

In fact, CKAN didnt work until I ran as admin.

Worth a shot as it worked for me....hope it helps.

Also, double check your mods as some may be incompatible with each other....I am not positive on this but it could provide an answer.

Edited October 17, 2017 by maceemiller

8 hours ago, maceemiller said:

May sound silly but try running as administrator.

I had this on 1.2.2 and still had it on my current 1.3, especially if running from the launcher.

In fact, CKAN didnt work until I ran as admin.

Worth a shot as it worked for me....hope it helps.

Also, double check your mods as some may be incompatible with each other....I am not positive on this but it could provide an answer.

I did not use ckan to install RO. I installed every mod manually with the latest 1.2.2 version. I think I'll just try and reinstall KSP and then every mod ... Hope it will work ...
